problem.p: I’ve designed a column that fails in compression. How could I modify the column such that it instead fails in buckling? Check all that apply.

checkboxgroup.label: I’ve designed a column that fails in compression. How could I modify the column such that it instead fails in buckling? Check all that apply.

div.p: Explanation: increasing the height and/or decreasing the width or diameter of the cross-section will make the column more likely to buckle.
